metadata.title: CVE-2022-3190 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Infinite loop in the F5 Ethernet Trailer protocol dissector in Wireshark3.6.0 to 3.6.7 and 3.4.0 to 3.4.15 allows denial of service via packetinjection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
